name: Ice Cream Social
description:
CONTROLS:

Move - "AD" or Arrow Keys

Interact - Spacebar

Advance Dialog Text - "E"

Credits:

Code: Michael and Vijay

Visuals: Ethan and Mari

Music: Ethan

SFX: Michael

Everything was homemade for the jam, no pre-made assets or code

Game Engine used was Godot

Pixel art made in Aseprite
